Description: Funerary papyrus of Padikhonspakhered containing Book of Traversing Eternity (short version) written in hieratic script.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F.R. Herbin, Le Livre de parcourir l'eternite, OLA 58 (1994), pp.30-31, pl.XXXIV. Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, p. 157, pls. 145-146.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (174)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (p.157, pls. 145-146)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57914) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57914)
